mapper.select: select re_no, re_content, re_content as up_content, to_char(re_reg_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd. hh24:mi') as re_reg_date, m.m_no, m.m_nick, length(re_content) as relength from board_reply b, (select m_no, m_nick from member where m_del_yn='n') m where b.m_no = m.m_no and re_del_yn = 'n' and no = #{no} order by re_no
mapper.update: update board_reply set re_content=#{re_content}, re_up_date=sysdate where re_no=#{re_no} and re_del_yn='n'
update board_reply set re_del_yn='y' where re_no=#{re_no} and re_del_yn='n'
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_reply where no=#{no} and re_del_yn='n'
